attributes.action: Abolish council tax as it is an unfair tax, use income tax instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council tax is unfair as there is no real determination on your ability to pay, and the service received is usually poor in relation to the money spent.

This would also have the added benefit of reduce administration costs, 
while some people would see a slight increase in total tax paid, those who cannot afford to pay would benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
